name: Full Adder
description:
A Full-Adder adds A + B + CarryIn and outputs Sum + CarryOut.
This is the core building block of CPUs for arithmetic
objectives: Build a full-adder using two half adders and one or gate
hints: A Full Adder needs to add three bits: A, B, and CarryIn
Use the first Half Adder to add A and B together
Use the second Half Adder to add the Sum from the first adder with CarryIn
If either Half Adder produces a carry, the final CarryOut should be 1
Connect the carry outputs from both Half Adders to an OR gate
